== Introduction ==

foo2capt is an open source driver written by Alexey Galakhov for Canon CAPT laser printers. Upstream is <nowiki>[[https://sourceforge.net/projects/foo2capt/|foo2capt on Sourceforge]]</nowiki>. For the closed source driver from Canon see CanonCaptDrv190. 

== Compatible printers ==

LBP-2900, LBP-2900B, Canon LBP-3000.

== Install Instructions ==

<pre>
git clone git://git.code.sf.net/p/foo2capt/foo2capt
cd foo2capt
sudo apt-get install libusb-1.0-0-dev libcupsimage2-dev
dpkg-buildpackage -b
sudo dpkg -i ../cups-driver-capt_*.deb
</pre>
